reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1030: ONTARIO CENTRE FOR RESOURCE MACHINERY TECHNOLOGY
reg_info.reg_name_text: ONTARIO CENTRE FOR RESOURCE MACHINERY   TECHNOLOGY
reg_info.citation: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1030: ONTARIO CENTRE FOR RESOURCE MACHINERY TECHNOLOGY
reg_info.act_under: Technology Centres Act   Loi sur les centres de technologie

content.content: 1. The Ontario Centre for Resource Machinery Technology is continued. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1030, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The Ontario Centre for Resource Machinery Technology is continued. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1030, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The Centre shall pursue its object in the resource machinery sector. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1030, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The Centre shall pursue its object in the resource machinery sector. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1030, s. 2.

content.content: 3. The operational period of the Centre expires with the 31st day of December, 1994. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1030, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. The operational period of the Centre expires with the 31st day of December, 1994. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1030, s. 3.

content.content: 4. The head office of the Centre shall be located in the City of Sudbury. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1030, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. The head office of the Centre shall be located in the City of Sudbury. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 1030, s. 4.
